amendatorysection.catchline: Demonstration project; Department of Health and Human Services; apply for waiver.
amendatorysection.para: On or before September 30, 2013, the Department of Health and Human Services shall apply to the United States Secretary of Health and Human Services for approval of a demonstration project pursuant to 42 U.S.C. 1320a-9 to obtain a waiver as provided in 42 U.S.C. 1320a-9(b), as such section existed on January 1, 2012.
